trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Application.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" name="My.Application.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" href=""></xref> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" name="My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" href=""></xref> events.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Application.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" name="My.Application.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" href=""> </xref> e <xref uid="langword_csharp_My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" name="My.Computer.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged" href=""> </xref> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events occur when the availability of the network changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>e o <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>eventos ocorrem quando a disponibilidade da rede é alterada.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: NetworkAvailableEventArgs contains the new state of the network connection.
trans-unit.target: NetworkAvailableEventArgs contém o novo estado de conexão de rede.

trans-unit.source: To get the current state of the network connection, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o estado atual da conexão de rede, use o <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>propriedade.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.StartupNextInstanceEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events occur when the availability of the network changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>e o <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>eventos ocorrem quando a disponibilidade da rede é alterada.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs> contains the new state of the network connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs>contém o novo estado de conexão de rede.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To get the current state of the network connection, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o estado atual da conexão de rede, use o <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>propriedade.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether a network is available to the application.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Boolean>que indica se uma rede está disponível para o aplicativo.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether a network is available to the application.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a rede está disponível para o aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> and the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> events occur when the availability of the network changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>e o <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>eventos ocorrem quando a disponibilidade da rede é alterada.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices.WindowsFormsApplicationBase.NetworkAvailabilityChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs> contains the new state of the network connection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs>contém o novo estado de conexão de rede.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.NetworkAvailableEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To get the current state of the network connection, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o estado atual da conexão de rede, use o <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>propriedade.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Devices.Network.IsAvailable%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether a network is available to the application.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Boolean>que indica se uma rede está disponível para o aplicativo.</xref:System.Boolean>
